translations: 配音；爵士的授予；制假蝇饵的材料
把……称为；封……为爵士；配音，译制（dub 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: To improve his performance, Li attended a training course at Communication University of China to learn dubbing and how to write a play in 2018. So far, he has completed nearly 30 works on Qingting.
sentences.translation: 为了提升他的表演水平，2018年，李参加了中国传媒大学的配音和剧本写作训练课程。目前，他已经在蜻蜓FM上完成了将近30部作品。

sentences.sentence: My dream is to be a dubbing.
sentences.translation: 我的梦想是当一名配音员。

sentences.sentence: Another member is the imple we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao ation of the role of dubbing.
sentences.translation: 另一位成员主要是执行配音的角色。
